createClass.description: Creates a new class. Usage: createClass <class_name>

addField.description: Adds a Field to a class. Usage: addField <class_name> <field_type> <field_name>

addMethod.description: Adds a method to a class with optional overloading. Usage: addMethod <class_name> <method_type> <method_name>

addRelationship.description: Adds or updates a relationship in a class. Usage: addRelationship <class_name> <relationship_type(1-7)>

removeField.description: Removes an Field from a class. Usage: removeField <class_name> <field_name>

removeMethod.description: Removes a method from a class. Usage: removeMethod <class_name> <method_name>

listAll.description: Lists all classes with their fields and methods. Usage: listAll

listClassNames.description: Lists only the class names. Usage: listClassNames

listClassRelationships.description: Lists classes that have relationships. Usage: listClassRelationships

save.description: Saves the current progress to a file. Usage: save <filename>

load.description: Loads the saved progress from a file. Usage: load <filename>

clear.description: Clears all the current progress. Usage: clear

renameField.description: Renames a field in a class. Usage: renameField <class_name> <old_field_name> <new_field_name>

renameMethod.description: Renames a method in a class. Usage: renameMethod <class_name> <old_method_name> <new_method_name>

addParameter.description: Adds a parameter to a method. Usage: addParameter <class_name> <method_name> <parameter_name> <parameter_type>

removeParameter.description: Removes a parameter from a method. Usage: removeParameter <class_name> <method_name> <parameter_name>

exit.description: Exit the program at any time

undo.description: Reverts the last action performed by the user

redo.description: Restores the most recently undone action
